item.title: Link styles
item.description: These are all the built-in link styles available in Lynx. Don’t forget that you can also create your own styles — check the readme for more details. email link amazon apple codepen dev discord dribbble facebook flickr foursquare github gitlab google instagram keybase kickstarter lastfm linkedin mastodon medium microsoft patreon pinterest reddit slack snapchat soundcloud steam telegram tiktok tumblr twitch twitter whatsapp youtube
